extendedInfo.description: With this app you can speed dial the contacts you choose straight from your home page, with only a single tap. No Launcher is required!Big Contacts Widget allows you to choose up to 9 contacts to be shown on your home page. After you setup the contacts and place the widget on your home page, you can tap each contact to make a call.The app currently provides 2 widgets (both use a full screen):â¢ 2X2 grid view â display only 4 HUGE contactsâ¢ 3X3 grid view â display 9 large contactsBig Contacts Widget is ideal for making calls while driving, and to easily reach the contacts you use on a daily basis.How to setup the widget:1. Install the app2. Open the app 3. On the screen you will see 9 available slots for you to fill4. Click each position in the grid to add a new contact or change an existing contact5. If the contact has more than one phone number choose the number you want to use6. You can choose if you prefer a text for the contact display or using an image (if available for the contact) by changing the checkbox on the bottom of the app page7. Once all the contacts are ready go to your homepage and place one of the available widgets â the widget require a lot of space so prepare an empty screenHow to change an existing contact:1. Open the app2. Click on the contact you want to change3. Choose the new contact4. Go to your home page and remove the widget5. Add the widget again (it isn't auto refreshed)

reviews.title: Ugly
reviews.comment: Photos are resized to very low quality.
reviews.author: Vincent Tai

reviews.title: Simple & effective
reviews.comment: I use it while driving and to contact my favorite people
reviews.author: A Google User
